{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Xiaomi |model=MiWiFi 3 |revision=C (R3C) |series=N300 |est_release_date=2016 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |type=wireless router |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7628N |cpu1_cspeed=575 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=W25Q128JV |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM68B16CWQH-25H |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, J1 |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7628N |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=2 |wan_speed=100M |wan_ports=1 |802dot11_protocols=bgn |stock_boot=U-Boot;1.1.3; |stock_os=Linux;2.6.36; |default_ssid=Xiaomi_XXXX |default_ssid_regex=^Xiaomi_[A-F0-9]{4}$ |default_ip=192.168.31.1 }} {{TagLine|Xiaomi MiWiFi R3C}} :[http://www.mi.com/miwifi3c/ Product page] (CN)
